feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 5:23PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...THUNDERSTORMS APPROACHING TOGIAK AND TWIN HILLS... A slow moving cluster of thunderstorms is approaching Togiak and Twin Hills. Radar and lightning detection suggest the storms have had a history of small hail, locally gusty winds, and frequent lightning. Interests in the area are encouraged to seek shelter until the storms have passed.
